Name: Distancing
About the game: A very small game about social distancing in Covid-19 times, where you play a small scenario in daily life. You play a character that is going to a party. While on your way you need to try and keep your social distance to the people in the town. Before you can arrive at the party you will need to pick up some snacks that you can bring. The length of the game is about 5-15 minutes. The controls are very simple with the use of 'WASD' / arrow keys and the spacebar for interactions.
Developers: Jan Place Jakobsen,Kristoffer Juel Friis,Jonas Skjønnemann,Ignacy Grabowski
Publishers: Jan Place Jakobsen,Kristoffer Juel Friis,Jonas Skjønnemann,Ignacy Grabowski
